verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> what is the vine<WH1612> tree<WH6086> more than any tree,<WH6086> the vine-branch<WH2156> which is among the trees<WH6086> of the forest?<WH3293>
Shall wood<WH6086> be taken<WH3947> of it to make<WH6213> any work?<WH4399> or will men take<WH3947> a pin<WH3489> of it to hang<WH8518> any vessel thereon?<WH3627>

Behold,<WH5414> it is cast into the fire<WH784> for fuel;<WH402> the fire<WH784> has devoured<WH398> both<WH8147> its ends,<WH7098> and its midst<WH8432> is burned:<WH2787> is it profitable<WH6743> for any work?<WH4399>

Behold,<WH8549> when it was whole, it was meet<WH6213> for no work:<WH4399> how much less,<WH784> when the fire has devoured<WH398> it,<WH2787> and it is burned, shall it yet be meet<WH6213> for any work!<WH4399>

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> As the vine<WH1612> tree<WH6086> among the trees<WH6086> of the forest,<WH3293> which I have given<WH5414> to the fire<WH784> for fuel,<WH402> so will I give<WH5414> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

I will set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> against them;<WH3318> they shall go forth from the fire,<WH784> but the fire<WH784> shall devour<WH398> them;<WH3045> and you shall know that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I set<WH7760> my face against them.<WH6440>
I will make<WH5414> the land<WH776> desolate,<WH8077> because they have committed<WH4603> a trespass,<WH4604> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
